title: [综合]BlockSurvival —— 轻量型一站到底小游戏[1.11-1.12]
author: 小鱼123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小鱼123 于 2018-2-8 22:24 编辑 

Github链接：http://github.com/beagmon/BlockSurvival

BlockSurvival 是一个快节奏的小游戏 , 在一个场地内的方块会一个接一个的消失. 玩家的目标就是成为留在方块上的最后一个人!BlockSurvival is quick little mini-game where blocks inside of an Arena will start to disappear one by one. The goal of the players is to be the last one standing!

非常容易地设置领域以及命令使用的详细反馈.多个区域.自动恢复竞技场.竞技场可以有任意数量的玩家（除2人以下！）不需要依赖，而且非常轻量级.支持多个竞技场的 "加入" 告示牌.免费




Very easy to setup arenas with detailed feedback on command use.Multiple arenas.Automatically restores arenas.Arenas can have any number of players (except below 2!)No dependencies required and is very lightweight.Multiple "JOIN" signs supported for arenas.Free



=======================================
Arena Setup Commands - 竞技场创建指令
=======================================
/blocksurvival setmainlobby - 设置当前位置为玩家结束游戏或退出竞技场时的传送点.
/blocksurvival status <arena> - 检查一个竞技场的设置状态.
/blocksurvival create <arena> - 创建一个竞技场.
/blocksurvival delete <arena> - 删除一个竞技场.
/blocksurvival enable <arena> - 启用一个竞技场.
/blocksurvival disable <arena> - 禁用一个竞技场.
/blocksurvival pos1 <arena> - 设置竞技场的 #1 点.
/blocksurvival pos2 <arena> - 设置竞技场的 #2 点.
/blocksurvival setminplayers <arena> <amount> - 设置竞技场的最小玩家数.
/blocksurvival setmaxplayers <arena> <amount> - 设置竞技场的最大玩家数.
/blocksurvival difficulty <arena> <level:1~5> - 设置竞技场难度 (1 = 最慢, 5 = 最快).
/blocksurvival usefloor <arena> - 打开或关闭一个竞技场的淘汰区.
/blocksurvival floor <arena> - 设置所在高度 (y-值) 为竞技场淘汰区.
/blocksurvival death <arena> <type:NONE/VOID/LAVA> - 设置淘汰区为虚空或岩浆 (能与淘汰地板一起使用).NONE=禁用，VOID=虚空，LAVA=岩浆 

=======================================
Admin Commands - 管理员指令
=======================================
/blocksurvival forcestart <arena> - 强制开启一个竞技场 (竞技场至少有2名玩家).
/blocksurvival forcestop <arena> - 强制停止一个竞技场 (竞技场必须已经开始).

=======================================
Player Commands - 玩家指令
=======================================
/blocksurvival list - 列出所有竞技场.
/blocksurvival join <arena> - 加入一个竞技场.
/blocksurvival leave - 离开竞技场.



1.使用 "/blocksurvival setmainlobby" 命令来设置大厅传送点
2.使用 "/blocksurvival create <arena>" 来创建一个竞技场
3.可选: 使用 "/blocksurvival lobby <arena>" 来为这个竞技场创建一个大厅
4.使用 "/blocksurvival pos1 <arena>" 设置竞技场的 #1 点
5.使用 "/blocksurvival pos2 <arena>" 设置竞技场的 #2 点
6.使用 "/blocksurvival setminplayers <arena> <amount>" 设置竞技场最少参加人数
7.使用 "/blocksurvival setmaxplayers <arena> <amount>"设置竞技场最多参加人数
8.Set the difficulty / speed of the arena using "/blocksurvival difficulty <arena> <1~5>"
9.如果你希望玩家在低于一定高度时被淘汰，使用 "/blocksurvival floor <arena>" 来将你当前高度来设置为淘汰高度.
10.可选: 如果你不打算使用一个淘汰高度，你也可以让玩家在受到虚空或熔岩伤害时被淘汰。这可以通过使用"/blocksurvival death <arena> <type:NONE/VOID/LAVA>" 来实现.
11.加入告示牌可以通过以下格式被创建:
     1行: [bs] 或 [BlockSurvival]
     2行: JOIN
     3行: <Arena>
12.离开告示牌可以通过以下格式被创建:
     1行: [bs] 或 [BlockSurvival]
     2行: LEAVE来自原作者的插件设置流程视频

1.Set main lobby using "/blocksurvival setmainlobby"
2.Create an arena using "/blocksurvival create <arena>"
3.OPTIONAL: Create lobby for the arena using "/blocksurvival lobby <arena>"
4.Set position #1 of arena using "/blocksurvival pos1 <arena>"
5.Set position #2 of arena using "/blocksurvival pos2 <arena>"
6.Set minimum number of players using "/blocksurvival setminplayers <arena> <amount>"
7.Set maximum number of players using "/blocksurvival setmaxplayers <arena> <amount>"
8.Set the difficulty / speed of the arena using "/blocksurvival difficulty <arena> <1~5>"
9.If you want a player to be eliminated when they drop below a certain height use "/blocksurvival floor <arena>" to set your current height as the elimination height.
10.OPTIONAL: If you aren't going to use a elimination height, you can alternatively make the player be eliminated when taking VOID or LAVA damage. This can be done by doing "/blocksurvival death <arena> <type:NONE/VOID/LAVA>"
11.Join signs can be created using the format:
    Line 1: [bs] OR [BlockSurvival]
    Line 2: JOIN
    Line 3: <Arena>
12.Leave signs can be created using the format:
    Line 1: [bs] or [BlockSurvival]
    Line 2: LEAVE

Q. 竞技场是如何保存/恢复的?
A. 在插件从arena.yaml文件加载预先设置好的两个位置（1#,2#），并捕获所有这两个位置之间的方块的快照。竞技场结束，它会将每个方块恢复回原来的状态.
Q. 我该如何修改我的竞技场?
A. 使用"/blocksurvival disable <arena>"禁用竞技场，改变你的竞技场，然后使用"/blocksurvival enable <arena>"来重新捕获你的竞技场的两个位置之间的所有方块.Q. 你的插件中有已知的问题吗?
A. 如果你的竞技场没有一个安全的传送位置（即没有玩家可以站立的实体块），当玩家加入时，插件将崩溃，因为它将永远试图将玩家传送到安全的位置.
Q. 你将会支持哪些版本?
A. 我会永远支持Spigot / Bukkit的最新版本.
Q. 我应该如何报告插件的问题或提出问题?
A. 最快的方法是通过https://github.com/baegmon/blocksurvival/issues来报告一个问题或是请求一个新的特性，或者可以在讨论页中为你的想法留下评论.
Q. 你接下来要做什么插件?
A. 我的下一个插件将是一个BlockParty插件，玩家将必须站在正确的块或从天空坠落！（它也是免费的！）

Q. How is the arena saved / restored?
A. After the plugin loads the two positions from the arena.yaml file, it captures a snapshot of all the blocks between these two positions. After the arena is finished it restores each block back to their original state.
Q. How should I modify my arena?
A. Disable the arena using "/blocksurvival disable <arena>". Make changes to your arena and then using "/blocksurvival enable <arena>" will re-capture all the blocks again between your selected arena points.
Q. Are there any known problems in your plugins?
A. If there is not a single safe teleport location for your arena (ie. solid block for a player can stand on), the plugin will crash when a player joins as it will forever try to teleport players to a safe location.
Q. What versions will you be supporting?
A. I will always be supporting the latest version of Spigot/Bukkit.Q. How should I report issues with your plugins or ask for requests?
A. The fastest way to report an issue or request for features is through https://github.com/baegmon/BlockSurvival/issues. Otherwise you can leave comments in the discussion page for this resource.
Q. What plugins will you be working on next?
A. My next plugin will be a BlockParty plugin where players will have to stand on the correct block or fall from the sky! (It will also be free!)
